title: Eliminate a Variable

title: Add the Equations to Eliminate One Variable
text: Add the x's, y's, and constants. $$x$$ will be eliminated and then solve for $$y$$.\n$$-5y=-45$$\n$$y=9$$

title: Substitute Solution into Original Equations
text:
Substitute $$y=9$$ into the first equation, $$-3x+y=-9$$. Then solve for $$x$$.
$$-3x+y=-9$$
$$-3x+9=-9$$
$$-3x=-18$$
$$x=6$$

title: Solution as Ordered Pair
text: Solution to the system of equations is $$(6,9)$$.
